response.overview: Adrian Paciâ€™s Inside the Circle is a six-and-a-half-minute, black and white movie of interactions between a white horse and its trainer in a round, rustic pen.  The video Inside the Circle was developed during the RAVE East Village Artist Residency 2011 in Trivignano, with Tiziana Pers and the horse Tor De Chirincito. Set inside the training ring, the film explores the complex dynamics between man, animal and nature through an interaction between the horse and the young woman.  Shot in black and white and set inside a training ring, the 6 minute film explores the complex dynamics between man, animal and nature through an interaction between a horse and a young woman. It plays with elements which take the work into a dimension of suspension in time and space.
response.title: Inside the Circle
